title-part.text: DEVICES, APPARATUS OR METHODS FOR LIFE-SAVING

reference.text: valves specially adapted for medical use A61M39/00; life-saving devices, apparatus or methods specially adapted for use in water B63C9/00; divers' equipment B63C11/00; specially adopted for use with aircraft, e.g. parachutes, ejector seats,
; rescue devices peculiar to mining E21F11/00

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Rescuing from buildings or the like

reference.text: from mountains or trees A63B27/00, A63B29/00; from ships B63C

title-part.text: Devices for lowering persons from buildings or the like
by making use of rescue cages, bags, or the like

reference.text: elevators, escalators or moving walkways B66B

title-part.text: by making use of rope-lowering devices

reference.text: capstans, winches B66D

note.note-paragraph: Contrary to the references in the Guide Heading before group A62B1/00 and in group A62B1/16, this group contains also rope-lowering devices for mountaineering

title-part.text: with brake mechanisms for the winches or pulleys
with brakes sliding on the rope

reference.text: safety belts A62B35/00; mountain guy-ropes A63B29/02; life-saving belts for use at sea B63C

title-part.text: Other single parts for rope lowering-devices, e.g. take-up rollers for ropes, devices for shooting ropes
by making use of sliding-ropes, sliding-poles or chutes, e.g. hoses, pipes, sliding-grooves, sliding-sheets
by making use of jumping devices, e.g. jumping-sheets, jumping-mattresses
Devices or single parts for facilitating escape from buildings or the like, e.g. protection shields, protection screens
Portable devices for preventing smoke penetrating into distinct parts of buildings

reference.text: A62B1/00 takes precedence

title-part.text: Other devices for rescuing from fire

reference.text: ladders E06C

title-part.text: Gas-masks, including breathing apparatus, e.g. for high altitude, or masks therefor
Devices affording protection against harmful chemical agents

reference.text: composition of materials for coverings against harmful chemical agents A62D5/00, for transparent parts of breathing apparatus A62D7/00; composition of chemical substances for use in breathing apparatus A62D9/00
for medical purposes A61M16/00

title-part.text: and lung-controlled oxygen or air valves
Component parts for respiratory or breathing apparatus

reference.text: A62B19/00, A62B21/00, A62B23/00 take precedence

CPC-specific-text.text: Means for influencing the temperature or humidity of the breathing gas
Indicators or warning devices, e.g. of low pressure, contamination

reference.text: non-return valves mounted in breathing masks or helmets A62B18/10
SCUBA diving regulators B63C11/22

CPC-specific-text.text: pilot operated, i.e. controlled by valve means sensitive to a reduced downstream pressure

reference.text: for medical purposes A61M15/00

title-part.text: Devices for reconditioning breathing air in sealed rooms

reference.text: chemical purification, disinfection, or sterilisation of air A61L; in aircraft or submarines, insofar as they influence the construction of the vehicle or are influenced by its construction B63B, B64D, respectively; air-conditioning in general F24F

title-part.text: Special devices for ventilating gasproof shelters

reference.text: ventilating in general F24F

title-part.text: Installations affording protection against poisonous or injurious substances, e.g. with separate breathing apparatus

CPC-specific-text.text: preventing escape of dirt or fumes from the area where they are produced B08B15/00

reference.text: ; building aspects E04H9/00

CPC-specific-text.text: ; use of air currents for screening F24F9/00

title-part.text: Protective clothing affording protection against heat or harmful chemical agents or for use at high altitudes

reference.text: protective clothing for work or sport A41D13/00,

CPC-specific-text.text: e.g. overalls A41D13/02, surgical gowns A41D13/12; materials for protecting clothing A41D31/04

reference.text: ; protecting eyes or ears A61F9/00; composition of materials for protective clothing A62D5/00; life-saving garments for use at sea B63C; diving suits B63C11/02; flying suits,
B64D10/00; space suits B64G6/00; bullet-proof clothing F41H1/02

note.note-paragraph:
Groups A62B17/00 - A62B17/08 are incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A41D31/04.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: Adaptations for donning, adjusting or increasing mobility, e.g. closures, joints
Active or passive body temperature control
against contamination from chemicals, toxic or hostile environments; ABC suits

reference.text: protective covers when working B68C5/00

title-part.text: Breathing masks or helmets, e.g. affording protection against chemical agents or for use at high altitudes

CPC-specific-text.text: or incorporating a pump or compressor for reducing the inhalation effort

reference.text: A62B17/00 takes precedence; anaesthetic masks A61M16/06

CPC-specific-text.text: having means for creating a fresh air curtain

reference.text: A62B18/045 takes precedence
gas-masks for animals A62B18/06; masks for welders A61F9/06
A62B23/02 takes precedence; surgical face masks A41D13/11

CPC-specific-text.text: with fans for delivering air for breathing mounted in or on the helmet

title-part.text: Component parts for gas-masks or gas-helmets, e.g. windows, straps, speech transmitters, signal-devices

reference.text: eye-pieces for protective goggles A61F9/02; composition of materials for the windows or other transparent parts A62D7/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Assembling eyepieces, lenses or vision-correction means in or on gas-masks
Means for fastening gas-masks to heads or helmets
Adaptations for consuming refreshments without unmasking

title-part.text: Cartridges with absorbing substances for respiratory apparatus

reference.text: carbon dioxide absorbing devices A61M16/22

title-part.text: Devices for producing oxygen from chemical substances for respiratory apparatus

reference.text: gas-filters in general B01D

CPC-specific-text.text: the filter having substantially the shape of a mask

reference.text: surgical face masks A41D13/11

title-part.text: Methods or devices for testing respiratory or breathing apparatus

reference.text: apparatus for testing gastightness in general G01M

title-part.text: Devices, e.g. installations, for rendering harmless or for keeping off harmful chemical agents

reference.text: respiratory apparatus A62B7/00; gasproof doors, windows, shutters E06B

title-part.text: Containers or portable cabins for affording breathing protection with devices for reconditioning the breathing air or for ventilating,

CPC-specific-text.text: in particular those that are suitable for invalids or small children

reference.text: ventilation of gasproof shelters A62B13/00; protective clothes or coverings A62B17/00; treatment rooms for medical purposes A61G10/00

title-part.text: Devices for allowing seemingly-dead persons to escape or draw attention
Breathing apparatus for accidentally buried persons
Similar equipment for limiting displacement of the human body, especially in case of sudden changes of motion

reference.text: buckles A44B11/00; accessories for children's furniture A47D15/00; children's seats B60N2/24; safety belts or body harnesses for land vehicles B60R22/00; harnesses for parachutes B64D17/30; harnessing in aircraft B64D25/06; releasable fastenings F16B

CPC-specific-text.text: Full body harnesses covering at least shoulders and thighs
Belt sorting accessories, e.g. devices keeping the belts in comfortable positions

reference.text: lifelines, lanyards A62B35/0043
attachments A62B35/0037

CPC-specific-text.text: Details of ropes or similar equipment, e.g. between the secured person and the lifeline or anchor
Equipment which can travel along the length of a lifeline, e.g. travelers
Arrangements for bypassing lifeline supports without lanyard disconnection

title-part.text: Subject matter not provided for in other groups of this subclass
